alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 1:21PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bennington County through 200 PM EDT... At 121 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Manchester Center, or near Manchester, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Manchester Center, Peru, Stratton Valley, Beartown, Peru Town Center, French Hollow, North Dorset, Intervale, Manchester Depot, Richville, Barnumville, Strattonwald, Freedleyville, Landgrove Town Center, Bromley Village, Piper Ridge, South Dorset, East Dorset and North Landgrove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
